website_summaries.verdict: For less money than the competition, Nero offers a wide array of enthusiast-level video editing capabilities, but the interface is dated and it trails in support for new formats and techniques.
pros: Solid file format support, including H.265
cons: No direct output to social networks

customer_reviews.title: Very poor
customer_reviews.text: Good cut down product, but keeps bombarding you with adverts. I would expect this from a free version, but not one I've paid for. I've now uninstalled it and wish I had not wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this Nero software as when going to rip a Bluray to my HDD it refused to do it and asked me to upgrade the software. The company wants even more money from me. Also Nero Express was burning discs fine then all of a sudden failed on every burn. Useless software. Very dissapointed. You can find freeware that works better than Nero.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: The videos gitter
customer_reviews.text: We bought the software to write some blurays. My son has produced a film which he wants to distribute. The video files from his PC display fine with no issues but using this SW to take the mp4 files and write them out as bluray movies isn't producing an acceptable quality disk.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I've only burnt a few things yet but It's had no problems & even burns FLAC files which my previous version didn't without additions being made.
customer_reviews.author: Barrie Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Consistent
customer_reviews.text: Used this before and found it easy to use when I want to burn CD/DVD's.
customer_reviews.author: Newportonian

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what it says on the tin!
customer_reviews.text: This product contains a very annoying feature. You get the three apps listed on the label but it installs a load of nonsense which is a kind of advert for all their other apps which pops up univited. This can be fixed if you google it.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisM

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to copy some DVD’s which were not commercially produced of a wedding and another programme on a DVD-RW and it doesn’t seem to be possible without buying an upgrade Snake oil salesmen??
customer_reviews.author: Lester Beedell

customer_reviews.title: Top burning software
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says on the box and more.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I Have had this new version of nero about a month. it's better than the old one , does everything expected
customer_reviews.author: Mr M J Beever

customer_reviews.title: Just what looking for
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for easy use for photo video finished item great
customer_reviews.author: Maureen McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Great software but invalidated after only 4 months - returned
customer_reviews.text: Great range of facilities for all types of discs and the video conversion and encoding add-ons are a huge help. Maybe the price is too good to be true but my copy of the software has now been invalidated and will no longer function without asking me to go online and buy it again from the official Nero site. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

product_meta.title: Nero Standard 2019 Box
product_meta.description:
Platform:Box| Edition:StandardNero Standard 2019 is the perfect companion for your digital life. Organize and play your media on OneDrive with Nero MediaHome. Utilize your media archive for easy organizing of music, videos, photos, slideshows, movies, and TV shows. Play back photos, slideshows, video DVDs, audio CDs as well as Video and Audio files. Utilize express video editing for quick results and switch to multitrack editing for more. Create Video DVDs & Blu-ray Discs with numerous menu templates for your home cinema and rip Audio CDs for any of your music archives with album art included. Convert to the best matching video and audio formats for any playback device. With 1-click Rip & Convert you can rip Audio CDs and DVD-Video*content straight to your mobile device. Also utilize 'SecurDisc 4.0' for optical discs with highest security standards and best longevity.

BOX CONTAINS
DVD, manual
feature_bullets: DriveSpan App: Consolidates content from mobile devices, hard drives and your cloud to one clean storage space
Live Guide: Always know what, how and where to do in Nero Suite
Organize and play your media with OneDrive Files on Demand in Nero MediaHome
Create automatically movies & slide shows with "1-Click Video Story"
Now also convert to fully compatible disc profiles: DVD-Video, AVCHD & Blu-ray video discs
